prompts: Create a dinosaur-like Pokemon with strong, muscular limbs and a fierce expression.
Generate a massive, rock-type creature with a scaly body and vibrant colors.
Imagine a dragon-like Pokemon that roars loudly and dominates its territory.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a T-Rex but has majestic wings and a colorful tail.
Give me a fearsome Pokemon that stands tall and showcases both strength and agility.
Show me a prehistoric Pokemon with a menacing look and striking color patterns.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the might of ancient creatures with unique elemental traits.

distinctive_features: Large, spiked frills on the head
